title: Selling Old Judge KING KELLY & BUCK EWING -->on Ebay now
author: Misunderestimated

posts.post_title: Selling Old Judge KING KELLY & BUCK EWING -->on Ebay now
posts.post_content:
The Kelly card is $1250 I believe is it # 260e- (Boston-Bat at 45, no position) It was graded PSA 4 although the image is faded.

The Ewing (with Mascot) is $900 --  I believe it's 149v (W/ Mascot, New Yorks) Its image is clearer but it is graded PSA 1; presumably because of the back.
BOTH cards for: $1900
(Prices include registered mail and insurance -- paypal is accepted w/out surcharge)
First to contact at [url]bhodes@rcn.com[/url] accepting terms gets the card(s).....
